meanings.definition: To give someone a particular job or task to do.
meanings.sent1: The teacher assigned homework to the students.
meanings.sent2: She was assigned the role of team leader.
meanings.sent3: The cat assigned itself the duty of guarding the house.
meanings.sent4: The sun assigned the task of shining brightly to itself.
meanings.sent5: The detective assigned herself the mission of solving the mystery.

meanings.definition: To give someone a particular seat or room to use.
meanings.sent1: The flight attendant assigned seats to the passengers.
meanings.sent2: Each student was assigned a desk in the classroom.
meanings.sent3: The dog assigned itself the comfiest spot on the couch.
meanings.sent4: The queen assigned the throne to her eldest son.
meanings.sent5: The tour guide assigned the best room in the hotel to the VIP guest.

meanings.definition: To decide a particular time or place for something to happen.
meanings.sent1: The manager assigned the meeting to be held at 3 pm.
meanings.sent2: The committee assigned the event to take place in the park.
meanings.sent3: The clock assigned itself the task of reminding everyone of the time.
meanings.sent4: The rain assigned the perfect moment to start pouring.
meanings.sent5: The conductor assigned the concert to be performed under the stars.
